page.title: 09THE ANGEL,A VILLAGE PUB
page.content: The Angel is one of Sherston's pubs. We spoke to Mr.Bell there.He told us that the Angel was built in the{13th {century}but was burnt down in the {Great Fire of Sherston.}It was{rebuilt {in 1648.}The Fire place in the Lounge is original.There is a Main bar which has some pool tables,Gambling machines a Juke box and some chairs and tables. In the lounge there is also a bar.This is a quiet place.There is a place further out of the pub which is the skittle Alley.This also has a bar.The Angel got it's name because it used to be a place where people could stay and the cost of one night was an{Angel which was{a coin.}The pub opens at 11.00am until 2.30pm and then opens again at 6.00pm until 11.00pm.
